project.name: Tekup AI v2
project.description: Customer relationship management system with AI-powered analysis and email handling

architecture.client: client/src - React SPA with component-based architecture
architecture.server: server/ - Express backend with tRPC API routers
architecture.scripts: server/scripts/ - Customer analysis and data migration tools

customer_profiles.description: Customer profile management with case history and analysis

email_management.description: Gmail integration for email threading and customer communication

case_analysis.description: AI-powered customer case analysis and conflict resolution

commands.dev: pnpm dev - Start development server with hot reload
commands.check: pnpm check - Type checking without emit
commands.db:push:dev: pnpm db:push:dev - Push schema changes to dev database
commands.analyze:customer: pnpm analyze:customer - Run customer case analysis

copilot_instructions.code_style: Use TypeScript strict mode, functional components with hooks, and Tailwind utility classes
copilot_instructions.database: Use Drizzle ORM queries, prefer transactions for multi-step operations
copilot_instructions.api: Use tRPC routers for type-safe API endpoints, validate with Zod schemas
copilot_instructions.testing: When making changes, consider running 'pnpm check' to verify types
